params.instruction_str: Are the underlined verbs right or wrong? Correct them where necessary.

params.instruct_panel_str: If you are unsure about how the animation above works click the "Instructions" button for help

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>
mcq_xml.multiAnswerFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="score"/><text> out of </text><val id="total"/><text> correct.</text>
mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.start_text: I said that my car <u>was</u> just at the end of the drive, but the engine <u>wouldn't start</u>.
question.correct_text: I said that my car was just at the end of the drive, but the engine wouldn't start.
question.modelAnswerString:
I said that my car was just at the end of the drive, but the engine wouldn't start.
No change was necessary.

question.start_text: As it was dark and Moreton was still a long way away, he very kindly said that he <u>will drive</u> me there.
question.correct_text: As it was dark and Moreton was still a long way away, he very kindly said that he would drive me there.
question.modelAnswerString: As it was dark and Moreton was still a long way away, he very kindly said that he would drive me there.

question.start_text: However, he added that because <u>I've had</u> a shock I should take a rest first.
question.correct_text: However, he added that because I'd had a shock I should take a rest first.
question.modelAnswerString: However, he added that because I'd had a shock I should take a rest first.

question.start_text: He asked me inside and told me he <u>would make</u> some tea.
question.modelAnswerString:
He asked me inside and told me he would make some tea.
No change was necessary.
question.correct_text: He asked me inside and told me he would make some tea.

question.start_text: As I was resting on the sofa, he said I <u>can use</u> his phone to call my family if I wanted to.
question.correct_text: As I was resting on the sofa, he said I could use his phone to call my family if I wanted to.
question.modelAnswerString: As I was resting on the sofa, he said I could use his phone to call my family if I wanted to.

question.start_text: I replied that it <u>wasn't</u> necessary as I didn’t want to alarm them.
question.correct_text: I replied that it wasn't necessary as I didn't want to alarm them.
question.modelAnswerString:
I replied that it wasn't necessary as I didn’t want to alarm them.
No change was necessary.

question.start_text: So we had some tea and then he drove me to Moreton. When we reached my hotel he said that we <u>have been talking</u> such a lot but that he didn't know my name!
question.correct_text: So we had some tea and then he drove me to Moreton. When we reached my hotel he said that we had been talking such a lot but that he didn't know my name!
question.modelAnswerString: So we had some tea and then he drove me to Moreton. When we reached my hotel he said that we had been talking such a lot but that he didn't know my name!

question.start_text: I replied that my name <u>was</u> Sarah Harris and thanked him for being so kind.
question.correct_text: I replied that my name was Sarah Harris and thanked him for being so kind.
question.modelAnswerString:
I replied that my name was Sarah Harris and thanked him for being so kind.
No change was necessary.

question.start_text: He said that it <u>has been</u> nice to meet me and that he hoped we would meet again.
question.correct_text: He said that it had been nice to meet me and that he hoped we would meet again.
question.modelAnswerString: He said that it had been nice to meet me and that he hoped we would meet again.

question.start_text: I told him I <u>am going</u> to start work in Moreton the following week. We arranged to see each other again… and that's how I met my husband!
question.correct_text: I told him I was going to start work in Moreton the following week. We arranged to see each other again… and that's how I met my husband!
question.modelAnswerString: I told him I was going to start work in Moreton the following week. We arranged to see each other again… and that's how I met my husband!
